no_name: The scenario does not have a name.
subject_start_type_error: Subject "{{subject}}" starts with a {{type, lowercase}} node. A subject must be started by the player.
first_subject_start_type_error: The first subject "{{subject}}" starts with nodes with different types. The types must be the same.
end_with_outgoing_connections: Subject "%s" contains a node marked as an end that has outgoing connections.
unmarked_end: Subject "%s" contains a node without outgoing connections that has not been marked as an end node.
first_layer_count: The first layer must contain exactly one subject.

no_ending.single_subject: At least one node must be marked as an end.
no_ending.multiple_subjects: The last layer must have at least one node marked as an end.
